item.title: Social Justice
item.description: First published on Genesis Planetary on 24 Jun 2017. [This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents are either the products of the authorâ€™s imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.] The city was filled endlessly with these streets. Wide-built, marked by a row of towering commercial buildings on each side, most of them dilapidated or on the verge of becoming heritage sites.
